transcript:
suddenly her short downy lip quivered. Prince Andrew rose, shrugged his shoulders, and walked about the room. 
Pierre looked over his spectacles with nai've surprise, now at him and now at her, moved as if about to rise too, but changed his mind. 
"Why should I mind Monsieur Pierre being here?" exclaimed the little princess suddenly, her pretty face all at once distorted by a tear- ful grimace. "I have long wanted to ask you, Andrew, why you have changed so to me? What have I done to you? You a
